Sentencas: A series of supported Ni-Mo catalysts were synthesised through a deposition-co-precipitation method (DcP) and investigated in combined steam and dry reforming.
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: The prepared Ni-Mo catalysts supported by Yttria-Stabilised Zirconia (YSZ), Gadolinium-Doped Ceria (GDC) and Ceria Stabilised Zirconia (CSZ) with improved carbon tolerance have the potential to be used as anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: These catalysts will be applied in the anode supporting layer where most of the internal reforming reaction takes place.
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: The catalysts were compared to conventional reforming catalysts, where Al2O3 and TiO2 supports are typical for reforming catalysts.
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: The catalytic performance of the Ni-Mo catalysts according to the support materials was observed in the sequence Al2O3 > YSZ >
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming
Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: Formation of Mo2C improved catalytic activity towards the steam reforming reaction.
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming

Sentencas: Increasing the Mo loading to Ni catalyst improved the coke resistance properties; however, it reduced the catalytic activity.
Titulo: Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming
Nickel-molybdenum catalysts for combined solid oxide fuel cell internal steam and dry reforming
